WorkItem.ClosedComment: Problem was with wowhead parsing, should be fixed for next release.
WorkItem.Description:
I clicked the load frost emblems option, and looked in "edit items" and the Mage tier 10 items were still at cost 0.
 
I went into the cost thread and downloaded the frost.cost.xml file, loaded that in and they still showed up as 0 cost.
 
Manually inputting the costs works, but it's going to be a hassle inputting the cost for all frost badge items I can get.

Comments.Message:
OK this is getting old.

If you get this message on your gear "drops from unknown boss in icecrwon...wowhead lacks data" refresh from Armoury (since wowhead has no/wrong data don't use it....duh).

Now the gear has number of Frost Emblems that it costs and the viola item shows on list when filtered by Frost emblem options. 

Solves this problem and the "Frost emblem fails" issues.

Please think about what you are doing and complaining about prior to posting issues and discussions.
